name: The Jed Mahonis Group
tagline: Mobile Software Solutions for the Gig Economy
description:
The Jed Mahonis Group is a mobile tech consultancy who builds mobile software soflutions for the on-demand economy. We work with startups and SMBs to deliver best-in-class apps for your customers and employees.Â We specialize in native solutions for iOS and Android.
From sales productivity tools to micro social networks, our mobile software is used by millions of people around the world. We take pride not only in building powerful apps, but also in building powerful, long-lasting relationships with our clients. We're based in Minneapolis, but we work with companies from all over the Twin Cities and beyond. (And really, the winter isn't that bad.)
